title: Password Generator and Manager
description: Developed a secure password manager with custom encryption algorithms and a BLE beacon for location-based two-factor authentication.

title: Network Attached Storage (NAS) System
description: Built and configured a personal NAS, implementing data recovery techniques and gaining practical experience in network data transfer and protection.

title: Website Development for Local Business
description: Designed and developed a website adhering to modern standards, implementing analytics and practicing client communication.

title: 3D Printer Repair and Enhancement
description: Repaired a broken 3D printer and enhanced it with remote control capabilities using a Raspberry Pi.
